pym.menu.resource_path(resource, *elements)¶

Works as pyramid.traversal.resource_path() except does not quote or escape elements.

pym.menu.resource_path_tuple(resource, *elements)¶

Borrowed from pyramid.traversal.resource_path_tuple().
